attributes.action: Stop Tony Blair from becoming a Lord
attributes.additional_details:
Tony Blair took the United Kingdom to war with Iraq using unfounded information as an excuse to attack Iraq.
Mr Blair has tried to over turn a democratic vote to leave the European Union and in doing so undermined the UK negotiating position.
Mr Blair should not be allowed to meddle in British politics again
attributes.background: Prevent Tony Blair from becoming a Lord

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments. This includes petitions about appointments to the House of Lords.

Appointments to the House of Lords are made by the Queen, on advice from the Prime Minister. Appointments are vetted or recommended by the House of Lords Appointments Commission. You can read more about how members of the House of Lords are appointed here: https://www.parliament.uk/business/lords/whos-in-the-house-of-lords/members-and-their-roles/how-members-are-appointed/
